meta.title: AVA Studio City - Apartments in Studio City, CA | AvalonBay Communities | AvalonBay Communities

meta.name: title
meta.content: AVA Studio City - Apartments in Studio City, CA | AvalonBay Communities

div.h2: Whatever you want, the possibilities are endless at AVA.
div.span: AVA Studio City is a newly renovated living space in the diverse energy of Studio City, where bars and lounges converge with farmers market, parks and coffee shops, where sushi meets pizza, and music collides with art. Oh yeah, and we’re just minutes away from the 101 and the 134 Freeways and the Universal/Studio City Metro Station. At AVA Studio City, we offer newly renovated, amped-up studio, 1-, and 2-bedroom apartments featuring urban-inspired designs that extend beyond your walls to refreshed amenities with social spaces to connect, chill, and play. There’s an awesome two-level fitness center, indoor and outdoor chill spaces with WiFi, a fully renovated pool and sun deck with outdoor kitchen and more. We’re pet friendly, too (even big dogs). Plus, our technology package, AVAConnect, offers pre-installed high-speed and community-wide WiFi, the ability to submit maintenance requests and pay your rent online, Amazon Hub package lockers, and more. Upgrade any home to Furnished+ and enjoy the convenience of turnkey living. Dive in and make it yours. Apartment homes include features for persons with disabilities required by the Federal Fair Housing Act.

img.alt: Chill terrace with globe string lights.
Portrait of tattooed young man with sun glasses.

a.div: You already love this neighborhood. So, what are you waiting for? Get out there. Breathe it in. We’re giving you access to it all with plenty of space to get away from it all for when you need to recharge.

img.alt: Retro styled bicycle parked on city sidewalk.

a.div: When we say we’ll hook you up, we mean it. Phone charging stations and common areas with Wi-Fi help keep you connected. Oh, and then there’s the fitness center, parking and bike storage so you can stay on the move hassle-free. Told you.

img.alt: Three stylish young women posing together against an urban background.

a.div: Whether it’s an evening spent binge-watching the latest true crime docuseries or a lively game night in the lounge, you like to play host, and hey, a little apartment-envy from your friends never hurt.

div.div: Room dimensions, square footage, and features shown on the floor plan drawings are approximate and may vary between individual apartments that have similar layouts. Furniture shown on the floor plan drawings is representative and individual apartments come unfurnished unless specified otherwise. Quoted rent is per month for new move-ins to the community, based on the move-in date selected. Pricing may vary based on lease term. Quoted rent does not including other fees and charges that may be part of your lease (i.e. utilities, parking, etc.). Please contact the community for details. Prior to signing a lease, quoted rent, specials, availability, and other terms and conditions are subject to change without notice. Washington State - We require our own screening and do not accept comprehensive reusable tenant screening reports.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Homes fully furnished and connected to give you the lifestyle you deserve. Flexible lease terms for the ultimate convenience.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: We’ve got a variety of finish packages for you to choose from — choose one and then dive in and make it yours.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Your pet is part of the fam, and that’s why we take pet-friendly living to the next level. Plus, who could say “no” to that face?

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Find your fit at AVA. Whether you’re hitting the weights, the trails, or the yoga mat, we’ve got your back.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Our technology package gives you ease of access and can allow you to save on monthly expenses.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Start earning points on rent with our free residents reward program. Use your points for travel, future rent credit, fitness classes, and more.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Pay rent, submit a service request, find policies and more with our convenient online resident portal.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Offering a wealth of resident resources, our Relocation Advantage program assists in making your transition a smooth one.

","description":"AVA Studio City is a newly renovated living space in the diverse energy of Studio City, where bars and lounges converge with farmers market, parks and coffee shops, where sushi meets pizza, and music collides with art. Oh yeah, and we’re just minutes away from the 101 and the 134 Freeways and the Universal/Studio City Metro Station. At AVA Studio City, we offer newly renovated, amped-up studio, 1-, and 2-bedroom apartments featuring urban-inspired designs that extend beyond your walls to refreshed amenities with social spaces to connect, chill, and play. There’s an awesome two-level fitness center, indoor and outdoor chill spaces with WiFi, a fully renovated pool and sun deck with outdoor kitchen and more. We’re pet friendly, too (even big dogs). Plus, our technology package, AVAConnect, offers pre-installed high-speed and community-wide WiFi, the ability to submit maintenance requests and pay your rent online, Amazon Hub package lockers, and more. Upgrade any home to Furnished+ and enjoy the convenience of turnkey living. Dive in and make it yours.
